ygData.subject: Re: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: Well then the problem with this is that all mages get this spell which is also useless not to mention other useless spells. For instance Necros get a spell
ygData.messageBody:
Well then the problem with this is that all mages get this spell which is
also useless not to mention other useless spells. For instance Necros get a
spell called Voice Graft that lets you talk through your pet. What good is
that?

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Arwen <arwen@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 6:04 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Petiton to replace level 14 song


>From: "Arwen" <arwen@...>
>
>Dear fellow bards I wholeheartedly agree with Gatlin on the relative
>uselesness of the lvl 14 song....here is my thought on a possible
>replacement to it.
>
>Song of Thorns
>
>A party effect that is a damage shield for few ticks of damage, not
unlike
>a thistlecoat effect. It is DEFINATELY level appropriate as druids get
their
>shields early on.
>
>Elyana Silvanae
>Bardess of the 40th Chorus
>Innoruuk Server
>
>
>>
